thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com.au | airportrentals.com.au
thread.title: Katherine Payne

author: Katherine Payne
title: Katherine Payne
text:
I booked online with Airport Rentals: their system works well and the prices were very competitive. I also phoned and got very good service. My one suggestion is to make the pick up/drop off location of the car more clear. I had a bad experience once and therefore called to check this. As it turned out, the booking I was about to make was for cars that were not at the airport but about 10 minutes away. There was a shuttle but it did not operate at the times we needed. I ended up paying more to be able to pick up and drop off at the airport. I did not have an issue with the pricing related to the airport location but I would have been really unhappy had I booked the lowest price option and then discovered the problem with the shuttle.
Everything else was great.
